article_title: Muslim calls out Xenophobic Question ON AIR & Walks Out Of Interview
article_text:
VIDEO: Muslim calls out Xenophobic Question ON AIR & Walks Out Of Interview

Sky News Presenter Kay Burley asks Muslim spokesperson if he supports beheadings & condems terrorism after he already made a case against terror. He eventually walks out of the interview for the outrageous islamaphobic questions associating all Muslims with beheadings.
